site.title: Red5 Media Server
site.description:
Red5 is an open source media server written in Java that supports

Streaming Video _FLV, F4V, MP4, 3GP_

Streaming Audio _MP3, F4A, M4A, AAC_

Recording Client Streams _FLV and AVC/AAC in FLV container_

Shared Objects

Live Stream Publishing

Remoting

Protocols: RTMP, RTMPT, RTMPS, and RTMPE

WebSocket

HLS

RTSP 

image::http://red5.github.io/images/red5_splash.png[]

[Red5 on StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/red5)
